title: The Pox Academy
description: Jack is a typical teenager, leading a very ordinary life. But when his school is destroyed by an other-worldly creature, he finds himself thrown into a world of magic and monsters.Thousands of miles away, at the Pox Academy, Lincoln is shunned by the wizarding world and banned from using his own dark gift.As their paths collide, the two boys must confront their inner demons and face into a battle neither is prepared for.
author: Warren Mead
